content: Wow free gold for Rs.10 received
What is the difference between 24k and 22k
replyContent: Hello! 24K Gold signifies 99.9 % purity and 22K is approximately 91 percent pure gold, with the other 9% consisting of other metals such as copper, silver,zinc, etc. 24k gold can be bought as coins and digital gold however jewlery must be at least 22K for it to be wearable and durable. On Indiagold, we have 24k coins and DigiGold and 22k jewellery.
